member.name: CRYPTNET_URL_CACHE_RESPONSE_INFO
member.summary: The CRYPTNET_URL_CACHE_RESPONSE_INFO structure contains response information used by the Cryptnet URL Cache (CUC) service to maintain a URL cache entry. This structure composes the pResponseInfo member of the structure, which is passed to as the pAuxInfo parameter.

member.name: CRYPTNET_URL_CACHE_RESPONSE_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

summary.para: A value that indicates whether the cache entry contains HTTP response information.

listheader.description: The cache entry contains no response information.
The cache entry contains response information derived from HTTP response headers.

member.name: CRYPTNET_URL_CACHE_RESPONSE_INFO.wResponseFlags
member.summary: A value that specifies a collection of flags that control server-based certificate validation response options.

member.name: CRYPTNET_URL_CACHE_RESPONSE_INFO.LastModifiedTime
member.summary: A FILETIME structure that specifies the Last-Modified entity-header field value of the cached HTTP response for the URL.

member.name: CRYPTNET_URL_CACHE_RESPONSE_INFO.dwMaxAge
member.summary: A value that specifies the number of seconds in the max-age directive of the Cache-Control header of the cached HTTP response for the URL.

member.name: CRYPTNET_URL_CACHE_RESPONSE_INFO.pwszETag
member.summary: A pointer to a string that contains the ETag response-header field value of the cached HTTP response for the URL.

member.name: CRYPTNET_URL_CACHE_RESPONSE_INFO.dwProxyId
member.summary: A value that contains the MD5 hash of the HTTP response header values Via, ETag, and Last-Modified, if they exist.
